allow:
Bash(echo "Please run these commands on your server and share the output:

echo ''=== Container Status ===''
docker-compose ps

echo ''''
echo ''=== Nginx Logs ===''
docker-compose logs nginx | tail -50

echo ''''
echo ''=== Web Container Logs ===''
docker-compose logs web | tail -50

echo ''''
echo ''=== Test web container directly ===''
docker-compose exec web curl -v http://localhost:8000/api/health
")
Bash(FLASK_APP=app.py FLASK_ENV=development USE_SQLITE_DEV=true SECRET_KEY=dev-key flask db migrate:*)

Bash(sshpass -p "Serbatik11!!" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no nathan@vit-dev-website "echo ''Serbatik11!!'' | sudo -S cp -r /tmp/migrations /home/nathan/vitruvian-developer/website/ && echo ''Serbatik11!!'' | sudo -S chown -R nathan:nathan /home/nathan/vitruvian-developer/website/migrations")
